Spring Framework
  1. org.springframework.test.web.support

Uses of Package
org.springframework.test.web.support

Packages that use org.springframework.test.web.support
Package
Description
org.springframework.test.web.reactive.server
Support for testing Spring WebFlux server endpoints via WebTestClient.
org.springframework.test.web.servlet.client
Support for testing Spring MVC applications via RestTestClient with MockMvc for server request handling.
org.springframework.test.web.support
Support classes for testing web applications.
  • Classes in org.springframework.test.web.support used by org.springframework.test.web.reactive.server
    Class
    Description
    AbstractCookieAssertions
    Assertions on cookies of the response.
    AbstractHeaderAssertions
    Assertions on headers of the response.
    AbstractJsonPathAssertions
    Base class for applying JsonPath assertions in RestTestClient and WebTestClient.
    AbstractStatusAssertions
    Assertions on the response status.
    AbstractXpathAssertions
    Base class for applying XPath assertions in RestTestClient and WebTestClient.

  • Classes in org.springframework.test.web.support used by org.springframework.test.web.support
    Class
    Description
    AbstractXpathAssertions.CheckedExceptionTask
    Lets us be able to use lambda expressions that could throw checked exceptions, since XpathExpectationsHelper throws Exception on its methods.
